sentences.en: His head was modest wedge - shaped, high - cheekbone, nose slightly short.
sentences.cn: 头部呈适中的楔子形, 颧骨高, 鼻子略短.

sentences.en: She had high cheekbones and green eyes.
sentences.cn: 她有着高颧骨和一双绿眼睛。

sentences.en: She returned wearing a dab of rouge on each cheekbone.
sentences.cn: 她回来时,两边面颊上涂有一点淡淡的胭脂.

sentences.en: There was a triangular scar on his ckeekbone cheekbone.
sentences.cn: 他颧骨上有一块三角形的伤疤.

trans.tran_en: one of the two bones above your cheeks, just below your eyes
